sufian.video.stream

Class Recorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • MediaRecorder
      • sufian.video.stream.Recorder

  • public class Recorder
extends MediaRecorder
    An extended customized MediaRecorder that can write the captured data directly to a socket.
    Author:
    Sufian Latif
    See Also:
    MediaRecorder

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static boolean DEBUG
      Set this to true to get Log messages from this class.

      A LocalSocket to connect and capture data from receiver.

      A LocalSocket to receive recorded data.

      A LocalServerSocket to connect two LocalSockets.

    • Method Detail

      • prepare

        public void prepare()
        Overridden method of MediaRecorder.prepare().

        Sets sender's file descriptor as the output file of the underlying MediaRecorder.

      • getInputStream

        public InputStream getInputStream()
        Returns the InputStream of the LocalSocket receiver. It contains the camera output data.
        Returns:
        The InputStream of receiver
